`{shinipsum}` provides a set of functions to generate dummy widgets and content for `{shiny}` applications.

This R package is a simple package designed to generate placeholder elements for `{shiny}` applications. It provides a set of functions that can be used to generate 'lorem ipsum' style elements that can be used as filler in Shiny applications while prototyping.
